name: Ultimate Zombie Gun 2018
description:
Ultimate Zombie Gun 2018!!!
Shooting zombie ultimate king battle adventure is not that easy as there are armed, evil, stalkers and fat zombies that are difficult to dead assault fps zombie hero. You need the real best sniper zombie snow assassin shooter to survive in the dead city. Be the legend of zombie 3D city defense shooting by becoming an extreme angry zombie gun shoot attack 3D.
